parameters: \n<Oliullah>I saw those memories before I even went to your School
\n<Oliullah>I saw what your friend did,\. just as you have now.
\n<Oliullah>Well,\. I don't think it matters.\. Not for me.
\n<Oliullah>I was only created by Sebastian's imagination, after
\n<Oliullah>But I realized...\. what if I could become more?
\n<Oliullah>I made an alliance with Sophia Evers,\. and used the
Evers Collection to learn about dark magic.
\n<Oliullah>And I realized that,\. with a strong enough will,\. he
could wake up again.\. Any of you could wake up again.
\n<Oliullah>If I could take control of one of Sebastian's
\n<Oliullah>Then would I not be able to wake up in the real world?
Oliullah takes out a potion with a black liquid.
\n<Oliullah>This world is part of another reality,\. one
that was created from his creativity.
\n<Oliullah>But I do exist.\. I'm conscious.\. And now
that I know there's something beyond, a
\n<Oliullah>I must reach it,\. no matter the cost.
\n<Adrianna>Uh,\. do you know what he's talking about?
\n<Juan>Do you have any clue what he's talking
\n<Josh>Uh, do any of you know what he's talking
\n<Will>Me neither,\. but it can't be good.
have to do is drink this potion,\. and my

maybe you can use that determination to

to keep everyone's memories.\. That way,\.

in this one item.\. I'm giving it to you.
\n<Oliullah>You won't be able to return to this place.
\n<Oliullah>So if you fail, then...\. well,\. I don't
know what will happen to you.
\n<Oliullah>But I believe you can get out of here.
\n<Oliullah>And I hope you can get the others out too.
In an instant, everything comes back.
As far back as Beck can remember,\. his elementary
days,\. his middle school,\. the bullies,\. his family,\.
his worries,\. his time at St. Joes,\. the bowling team,
